commit message: Run ProGuard for development builds too.
For selected transactions, break out time into a new line.
For selected transactions, allow address to wrap.
For selected transactions, allow memo to wrap.
In transactions list, print address label in bold rather than the time.
Tint transaction value and confidence progress in green or red.
Use error color, rather than hardcode red.
Always show fee while outgoing transaction is still pending.
Workaround for failing baseline alignment of selected transactions.
Remove button indicator from local balance.
Extract color constants from widget layout.
Remove app icon from action bar.
Add a bit of drawable padding for action buttons with text.
